title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 55.6 - Records to be kept
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 55.6 - Records to be kept

State Regulations
A record shall be kept by each chief fiscal officer, registration agent and paying agent of all obligations cancelled or destroyed
by them, respectively, which record shall properly describe the obligation
cancelled or destroyed and state the date of such cancellation or
destruction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
55.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
